Text: I think the absolutely best option is to see a dietician and follow their advice. They’re professionals for a reason.

Author: snefferu
Text: Just do what you can, if you can only manage 100 surplus each day that’s good, but if you’re restricting your surplus to only 100 each day that’s not recovery. I’ve recovered a bunch of times and I’ve experienced some episodes in which i had extreme hunger and rapid weight gain, and other episodes in which I found it extremely difficult to eat enough and really struggled to gain any weight at all. It’s tough either way, but you can do it! Emotional recovery is key. Good luck
